definition: to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: See it, when The Empire Strikes Back.
sentences.chinese: 當《帝國反擊戰》來襲時，去看吧。

sentences.english: This article proposes an improved mehodof selecting the desirable type and parameter for a reaction turbine.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種改進的反擊式水輪機選型方法。

sentences.english: He seems to prefer intellectual counteroffensives to decrees and crackdowns.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎更傾向於用知性的反擊來判決和痛擊對手。

sentences.english: Can he play Lazarus one last time?
sentences.chinese: 現在他能最後一次上演絕地反擊嗎？

sentences.english: Long day back cover of the accused, said he "will not fall."
sentences.chinese: 隆蓋當天反擊這一指責，稱自己“不會倒下”。

sentences.english: The team was off balance and conceded too much on the counter-attack.
sentences.chinese: 球隊有些失衡，在應對防守反擊中丟了太多球。

sentences.english: Instead, however, United countered this tactic by taking advantage when possession changed hands.
sentences.chinese: 不過，當控球權易手時，曼聯卻通過反擊佔了上風。

sentences.english: Anor hoped to strike back at Overlord Shimrra in revenge for his misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 阿諾希望對希姆拉霸主發動反擊，爲自己的不幸報仇。

sentences.english: Counter-attacking is the predominant strategy in top-level football at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 防守反擊是高水平比賽中常見的戰術。

sentences.english: The VSI Impact Crusher is advanced and high-efficiency equipment.
sentences.chinese: VSI的反擊式破碎機是先進和高效率的設備。

sentences.english: One multinational beverage producer immediately retaliated with threats of an investment freeze.
sentences.chinese: 一家跨國飲料商立即予以反擊，威脅將凍結投資。

sentences.english: Dryad : Flyer, No Enemy Retaliation, Spray Attack, Treant Union.
sentences.chinese: 飛行兵種，無反擊，揮灑攻擊，樹精聯盟。

sentences.english: Fett was one of the first new characters to be designed for The Empire Strikes Back.
sentences.chinese: 費特是第一個爲《帝國反擊戰》設計的新角色。

sentences.english: Just like on the ground, weapons can be quickly slewed for counterfire.
sentences.chinese: 就象在地面上，武器可能很快轉向進行反擊。

sentences.english: We live with these standards, but we should fight them.
sentences.chinese: 我們生活在這些標準中，但是我們應該反擊。

sentences.english: Outgunned, outnumbered, but now fighting back.

definition: to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
